website_summaries.verdict: This small terrarium is a great choice for holding water and housing amphibians.
pros: The front opening door and lock are useful
Can hold up to 5" of water
A mini halogen light bulb and dome are included
Assembly of the terrarium is straightforward
cons: The door is prone to breaking
Heat lamp may stop working after just a few months

website_summaries.verdict: An easy to assemble, well manufactured tank. Ideal for frogs and crested geckos.
pros: Assembly of this tank is simple and fast
The large front glass door opens wide, making cleaning the tank a breeze
The screen top latches securely to the tank so there is no fear of your little critter escaping
cons: The included water dish was quite small – may be too shallow

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a crested gecko
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a crested gecko after hearing too many stories about geckos losing their tails in the double door style tank. Everything that comes with this kit is useable whereas you'd want to throw away a bunch of things from the other sets. So far it's well made and very cute when it's all set up and decorated.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Door Doesn’t Work but is Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a great terrarium, with lots of protection. It comes with a light, daytime lightbulb, food bowl (which is to small to put anything in), background, and bedding. It is a great price and great quality, except for the fact that the door isn’t installed properly so it won’t close. You have to remove it and then it take a long time to get it right. It’s a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome, complete kit
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome, complete kit, for my crested gecko. It is high quality and assembles quickly and easily. Shipped quick and in very durable packaging. The kit comes with some great coupons to save you money on refills for the kit. Easy to clean. Secure. Would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: pculter

customer_reviews.title: Functional, pretty, perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a tall, narrower terrarium for our beardy in the car for our move. This was perfect! Fit in between the kids' seats and kept our little lady reptile safe. Will be using when it comes time for her to lay her next clutch, also. All of the accessories were great for our short term needs, but, as stated in the listing, are definitely geared toward a more tropical pet. Would absolutely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit for my tree frogs, except I would get a different lamp. The halogen lamp is pretty warm and I'm worried about my frogs overheating while I'm at work. I also wouldn't use the ceramic dish for water, as it is very shallow and not very big and can't really accommodate even small frogs, but maybe it is good for lizards who only need to drink from the dish.
customer_reviews.author: Catie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price with all that is included. Only things I had to purchase additionally were a larger water dish and mini heat pad
customer_reviews.author: Croughn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously best experience ever. First one I got the glass was cracked so I couldn't open and close the door. I let them know and they had one out to me right away and I love this!!! We have a crested gecko and it couldn't be better! I don't see how people say that the light doesn't give off heat because it most certainly does. Again it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Great tank for a little lizard
customer_reviews.text: This tank is perfect for an anole. I found a baby brown Anole in one of my house plants in Boston, so I did a ton of research and purchased this cage. It comes with everything you need except live plants and spaghnum moss, but I already had both of those. My tiny lizard loves it and is thriving. I feed her flightless fruit flies and I haven't had any escape.
customer_reviews.author: Brittneyface

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and my crestie has moved up. It is decent for the price but the light is super flimsy and has too strong of a bulb. I don't trust the light and will get a ZOO MED replacement. I have one of each of the three most notable enclosures and the ZOO MED is by far the best and most durable. I probably will stick with ZOO MED even tho they run a little higher.
customer_reviews.author: Outlaw

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our tree frog for when we went on vacation. We tried it overnight and next morning we couldn't find our frog! We thought he got out!!we panic and look around as to how he got out. We found out that he went behind the background and couldn’t get out!! If we didn’t find him then probably he would have died! No photo was taken since we panic on how to get him out. Sorry we don’t recommend this item. Company needs to make changes to this item.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Came well packaged with no damage. I like that the top screening is metal, so it is safe for heating fixtures. and the top screen (most of it) is hinged so it can swing up - though the latches for it are a bit difficult to unlatch. the entire top can also be unlatched and removed. I don't care for the foam background they included, but, all in all, I think it is a nice set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I put my hatchling eyelash geckos in this cage and it's GREAT! I had to return the first one but the second one arrived super fast and of course free! It's perfect, easy to assess and clean. I'd buy another one from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: bunyz

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for My crested Gecko
customer_reviews.text: Works great and no problems, I’ve had the cage for a couple months now and my crested gecko is doing great
customer_reviews.author: TØP-saved-me

customer_reviews.title: Shop around prices vary quality is fine these are not meant to hold water at all
customer_reviews.text: I mean it’s perfect for my tree frog I get to have enough room for a second but 2 weeks after I bought this for another 10.00 I found same size with waterfall kit and many other accessories so tank is Great otherwise
customer_reviews.author: linda bell

customer_reviews.title: A Nearly Complete Setup
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my Crested Geckos. I say that this is a ‘nearly complete’ setup because it had everything except a hide, decorative plants, and a feeding ledge (does have a small bowl). This is a perfect set because it comes with the most commonly needed things to set up for a variety of reptiles and amphibians. Those other things can change based on your animal. Zilla does it RIGHT!
customer_reviews.author: Ducky Dee

customer_reviews.title: Would/Will purchase again. A+
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product for our Crested Gecko. Great value and built. (Although someone went a little glue happy, we had to cut and scrape the extra glue off the glass but that’s nothing. And the shipping was super quick and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: KBAD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Enclosure
customer_reviews.text: I love this enclosure! It’s perfect size for my crested gecko. He loves it. 10/10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Strobl

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice terrarium that comes with a great mini halogen light that puts out quite a bit of heat. I ditched the foam background and made my own. It has a good screen top. The door needs better engineering. It is on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: Really great product for the money. I did not use the mini halogen light, I felt it was unnecessary and I would have rather had a light fixture I could interchange different bulbs with. I ended up using a completely different light that I already had. The rest of it was great. I turned it into a Vivarium for my tree frog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: A solid value for the money. I set it up with 5 inches of water in the bottom for small fish and shrimp, and the upper half with sticks and perches for my fishing spider. Looks great. The latch and handle are plastic and I worry they may break over time, but for the price it is a great kit.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Bullock

customer_reviews.title: great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: My adult crested gecko is enjoying this new set up. He’s a senior and doesn’t explore as much as he used to, so this compact tank is wonderful. Tank comes with the decorative styrofoam back ground, light fixture, day bulb, coconut husk bedding,humidity and temperature gauge, small food dish. Easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: ZombiKat

customer_reviews.title: Great habitat.
customer_reviews.text: After getting a created gecko they wanted to sell me the cage. But by itself is what I paid for everything for this one. It was a great buy and I love everything that came with it including the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Guillen

customer_reviews.title: Great cage. Only wish the tie downs for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cage. Only wish the tie downs for the lamp where different. Difficult to attach and remove. If I open the top while lamp is lit I blind myself. If I turn lamp off I can't see inside. I feed my frog crickets at night when he comes out and like to see how many crickets fall into the cave and if he eats them all.
customer_reviews.author: Christina K.

customer_reviews.title: Great little terrarium
customer_reviews.text: Great little terrarium! I set it up for dart frogs, it's good for small lizards and frogs. Very cute and functional. Update: transformed it into a vivarium and got my first dart frog for it. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Tigersicord

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am using this item already 3 months still good
customer_reviews.author: good

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for tree frogs and ankles! I have 4, 2 of each in this environment and they thrive!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Alberico

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Love It! Very easy assembly. Good size for small reptiles
customer_reviews.author: Beth Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: The Styrofoam background is pretty cheesy, other than that it was been a great starter home for my son's Gecko. I am impressed with how warm it stays with the heat lamp that is provided. Definitely worth the money. We plan on using it for our tarantula after the Gecko is ready for a bigger home
customer_reviews.author: mamaof3

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my crested gecko!! He loves it and I love being able to watch him in it!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: Would be a perfect review but top is hard to open and light bulb arrived broken.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Mia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Setup
customer_reviews.text: Perfect setup! Came exactly how I expected. Just love everything.
customer_reviews.author: jessfrog

customer_reviews.title: Was not crack or broken
customer_reviews.text: Had to send it back, did not come with anything not even a lid!
customer_reviews.author: susan jones

customer_reviews.title: Our gecko likes it
customer_reviews.text: Great cage. The 2 part lock system is different. There is a plastic stick to place in front of the door after the turn lock. The stick broke in the first week. It is not essential to locking the cage.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Knecht

customer_reviews.title: Great but incorrect description
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the anole; however, the description states a light bulb is included in the kit which is incorrect. The kit delivered did not include a lightbulb.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy with it
customer_reviews.text: It came in unbroken and actually came 2-3 days earlier than it said on the Amazon app, which is good. I kinda wish it had more in the way of decorations but it’s fine the way it is
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: It is absolutely perfect for my Avicularia-Avicularia (Pink toe) tarantula!
customer_reviews.author: Roy Hulling

customer_reviews.title: Door is broken.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set up, but the door is damaged on the hinge and it will break off very easily, I am sure. I would like a replacement but we bought the geckos already and I can't send it back and wait for another to ship. There is no option to message the seller. Not sure what to do.
customer_reviews.author: Annie H.Top Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this cage for my created gecko. I can tell he likes it more and I love how this tank is naturalistic. Would definitely get another.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Loved how fast it got here and everything included with this price is great. No complaints 🙌🏼 My crestie is loving his new place
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Vucelik

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my green tree frog and his accessories. Very easy to put together, the lid was a little harder than I thought it would be, but it is secure.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Frankenfield

customer_reviews.title: Additions
customer_reviews.text: All I got was the glass cage? Not a screen top or anything I can work with
customer_reviews.author: Alex Graziano

customer_reviews.title: I did purchase a better lamp, but it worked
customer_reviews.text: It was just as stated. I did purchase a better lamp, but it worked, just wasn't warm enough.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rosse

customer_reviews.title: one of the best deals ive gotten by way of herp cages,especially arboreal.
customer_reviews.text: great quality,easy to navigate( opening,locking,multiple ways to place screen top which is non rust as well,etc.) and for the same price of a same size exo terra tank, but with lamp,thermometer,even safe water bowl, ($72.-$75.00 range ratio) ,deep bottom allowed vivarium drainage layer.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Kobashigawa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything is awesome! Only complaint is why foam back so damn thick?
customer_reviews.author: Sancho

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy with the overall kit
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the overall kit, I however am down grading the kit one star due to the materials provide. The backing is cheap and can't get wet at all. It does come with a light also but the bulb burned out within a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: its great except i didn't get the decor with mine.. :(
customer_reviews.author: jake leishman

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken, will try to reorder
customer_reviews.text: Comes fully assembled, smaller than expected. Glass arrived broken and shattered everywhere. Ordering a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Caty

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes this and his little crested gecko seems to thrive in the aquarium
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: would like it replace please
customer_reviews.text: light for the heat lamp went out after one day. would like it replace please.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel G

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It didn't pump the water at all after having it for 2 weeks only. Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my baby crested gecko
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a new 5 month old crested gecko. I love this cage! It almost everything you need for a first time set up. The only things i needed to add were some tank decor (plants, wood, moss). Otherwise, it came with everything else. For the price you cant beat this deal! ***Update*** I have only used the bulb for less than a week and it just burnt out on me this morning when I went to turn it on...buyers be cautious of this
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bruton

product_meta.title: Zilla Vertical Tropical Kit, 12x12x18
product_meta.description: Size:11 GALThe Tropical Vertical Kit is a tall reptile cage specifically designed for arboreal animals that live in trees - the ideal environment for small tropical reptiles and amphibians such as tree frogs crested geckos and more The bottom of the terrarium is also capable of holding water and the textured background décor piece substrate and feeding dish are included The Mini Halogen Dome with light bulb also inside is the perfect compact size for this vertical reptile terrarium as it provides pinpointed light and heat and is more efficient than a standard incandescent light bulb To help keep your critter safe and secure the front door of the reptile tank has a locking latch and locking pin for added security The top is also hinged providing access from both the front and top The Humidity/Temperature Gauge allows for a quick and easy read on the environment parameters to ensure they are at the right levels Dimensions are 12” x 12” x 18”
feature_bullets: Glass Terrarium holds up to 5” of water
Mini Halogen Dome with light bulb
Front opening door with locking latch and hinged screen top
Ideal for: Tree Frogs, Crested Geckos and more
Not recommended for iguanas, monitors or large sized reptiles
Ships with reinforced packaging to protect product

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
